meta.why: Poor sleep quality can significantly worsen pain sensitivity and slow recovery. A structured wind-down routine helps signal to your body that it's time to rest and repair.

hero.title: Sleep Wind-Down Checklist
hero.subtitle: CBT-I starter routine for better sleep
hero.description: Create a consistent pre-sleep routine that helps your body transition from wakefulness to restorative sleep. This evidence-based approach can improve sleep quality and reduce pain sensitivity.

tiles.title: **Environment Setup**
content: Remove all screens 1 hour before bed
Use blackout curtains or eye mask
Keep room quiet or use white noise

tiles.title: **Consistency is Key**
content: Stick to routine even on difficult nights

microAction.title: Tonight's Wind-Down
microAction.description: Choose 2-3 items from the checklist above and commit to doing them for the next 3 nights. Track how you feel in the morning.
microAction.action: Set a phone reminder for 1 hour before your target bedtime
